selected_quotes: Lessons from insects: how ants could teach humans how to develop tech that doesn't harm the planet
When it comes to inventing technology, us humans aren't a match for the insect world 🐜
Ants take up as much space as humans on the planet – so can they teach us how to damage it less?
Ant cites have garden centers, highways, rubbish depots, food distribution, police stations, and funeral services
Ants take up as much space as humans on the planet – so can they teach us how to damage it less? r…

citation.abstract: Insects developed technology long before we did, so perhaps they can show us how to use it without damaging the planet.
